name: UKNewsFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: A news skill to add to your flash briefing. This skill was created by Jody Burnett (@IGSoldiersCoach) co-founder of @ButtonPushApps. Using the public RSS feed from the BBC news, Alexa delivers the latest news from the United Kingdom as reported by the BBC.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
